title: WorldSpace Assure
creator: Deque Systems, Inc.
description:
Assure is a guided accessibility testing tool that will facilitate and take the guesswork out of: 
Rerunning tests on new builds and multiple browsers 
Verifying that requirements have been met 
Creating precise and consistent accessibility issue reports for developers 
Creating comprehensive report
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
<abbr title="Japanese Industry Standard">JIS</abbr>, Japanese industry standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
